DOC.HEADLINE: FRANCE , JACKSON SIGN WITH FOUR-YEAR SCHOOLS
DOC.TEXT: Aaron France of Cypress and Wade Jackson of Saddleback have signed to attend four-year colleges . France , a sophomore right-handed_pitcher , signed with Miami . France , from Loara High_School , is 9-3 with 99 strikeouts in 96 innings this season . Jackson , a sophomore third_baseman , signed with Nevada . Jackson , from El Toro High_School , is hitting . 374 for Saddleback . Jackson had home_runs in three consecutive games last season and has four home_runs this season.UNIVERSITY OF NEVA
